_sText: This is a map I made for CSS, which is loosely based on the CS 1.3 classic "de_torn" by Crinity. Latest Version : de_torn_ht_beta2 Author : cWg | Hubbell Tyson (www.cowswithguns.co.uk) Build Time : Approx 60 hours over a period of 3 weeks. Compile Time : Just under 5mins. Spawns : 40 total (20 per side). Nav file is included in the zip, and has area names which appear on your HUD. Tasks to complete before final version: - Add more atmospheric sounds. - Add some more debris and decals to further improve the maps look and feel. - Fix any issues reported in beta2.
